get.description: Gets the workspaces in a subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId

eTag.description: The ETag of the data source.

DataSourceFilter.description: DataSource filter. Right now, only filter by kind is supported.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of datasources.

DataSourceListResult.description: The list data source by workspace operation response.

displayName.description: The display name of the intelligence pack.

enabled.description: The enabled boolean for the intelligence pack.

name.description: The name of the intelligence pack.

IntelligencePack.description: Intelligence Pack containing a string name and boolean indicating if it's enabled.

LinkedService.description: The top level Linked service resource container.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of linked service instances.

LinkedServiceListResult.description: The list linked service operation response.

resourceId.description: The resource id of the resource that will be linked to the workspace.

ManagementGroup.description: A management group that is connected to a workspace

created.description: The datetime that the management group was created.

dataReceived.description: The last datetime that the management group received data.

id.description: The unique ID of the management group.

isGateway.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the management group is a gateway.

name.description: The name of the management group.

serverCount.description: The number of servers connected to the management group.

sku.description: The SKU of System Center that is managing the management group.

version.description: The version of System Center that is managing the management group.

localizedValue.description: The localized name of the metric.

value.description: The system name of the metric.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed etc.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

Operation.description: Supported operation of OperationalInsights resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of solution operations supported by the OperationsManagement resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list solution operations.

primarySharedKey.description: The primary shared key of a workspace.

secondarySharedKey.description: The secondary shared key of a workspace.

SharedKeys.description: The shared keys for a workspace.

currentValue.description: The current value of the metric.

limit.description: The quota limit for the metric.

nextResetTime.description: The time that the metric's value will reset.

quotaPeriod.description: The quota period that determines the length of time between value resets.

unit.description: The units used for the metric.

UsageMetric.description: A metric describing the usage of a resource.

Workspace.description: The top level Workspace resource container.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of management groups attached to the workspace.

WorkspaceListManagementGroupsResult.description: The list workspace management groups operation response.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of usage metrics for a workspace.

WorkspaceListUsagesResult.description: The list workspace usages operation response.

customerId.description: This is a read-only property. Represents the ID associated with the workspace.

portalUrl.description: This is a legacy property and is not used anymore. Kept here for backward compatibility.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the workspace.

retentionInDays.description: The workspace data retention in days. -1 means Unlimited retention for the Unlimited Sku. 730 days is the maximum allowed for all other Skus.

source.description: This is a read-only legacy property. It is always set to 'Azure' by the service. Kept here for backward compatibility.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group to get. The name is case insensitive.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
